title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald

scenes.action_text: FANTASTIC BEASTS: THE CRIMES OF GRINDELWALD Written by J.K. Rowling FINAL SHOOTING SCRIPT 2017/11/16 1. 1 EXT. NEW YORK, AMERICAN MINISTRY OF MAGIC 1927 (NIGHT) 1 AERIAL SHOT: New York and MACUSA building. 2 INT.
